column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Great Tapas.  The Sangria was very nice.  Service was good.  I heartily recommend the Spicy Potatoes
column2: they were my favorite.  also had the mushroom empanadas
column4: and chicken Paella which was also very good.  Also had one of the specials - beef that was tasty.  So 4 Tapas and one Paella plus the 1/2 pictcher of sangria for $71.00
